quest.name: A Welcome Surprise
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened intends to repay a debt to the Oronir.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the novice Namazu wrestler.

You have spoken with the novice Namazu wrestler.
Deliver the requested goods to the Oroniri wrestling instructor.
objectives: Speak with the novice Namazu wrestler.

Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the Oroniri wrestling instructorMine [Error] to the northeast of the Dawn ThroneGather [Error] to the northeast of the Dawn ThroneCatch [Error] in the upper Yat Khaal.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: You recall the Azim Bökh, yes? The fierce wrestling competition held by the Oronir tribe.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Well, they have been gracious enough as to teach us the fundamentals of the sport, and it goes without saying they must be duly compensated for their generosity.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: As the saying goes, he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and theirs would be most valuable to the Namazu. As we speak, one of my kin labors tirelessly to prepare a gift worthy of the Oronir's beneficence. Might I ask you to go and ensure his work is proceeding apace?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: You'll find him toiling away at the Dawn Throne. When the gift is finished, no need to bring it here for inspection. I have every confidence it will turn out wonderfully under your supervision.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Seigetsu sent you to help? That high-whiskered braggart! Does he not think I can't handle this on my own?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Well... I suppose I could use an extra pair of fins─er, hands.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to make a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. If you could take some of the supplies from this crate and craft a pair of vases for me, I can handle the rest.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to make a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. If you could take some of the supplies from this crate and craft a pair of satchels for me, I can handle the rest.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to make a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. If you could take some of the supplies from this crate and craft two bottles of perfume for me, I can handle the rest.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to prepare a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. Might I trouble you to mine a chunk of obsidian from the mineral deposits northeast of the Dawn Throne?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to prepare a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. Might I trouble you to pick a sprig of flatweed from the fields northeast of the Dawn Throne?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: I actually planned to prepare a number of things for the Oronir. Yes, yes, several gifts to show our appreciation. Might I trouble you to catch an appleseed from the waters of the upper Yat Khaal?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: When you've finished, you can give it to our instructor over there. It should make for a pleasant surprise coming from you.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: If you need materials for the vase, I'm sure there's more than enough in the crate. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: If you need materials for the satchel, I'm sure there's more than enough in the crate. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: If you need materials for the perfume, I'm sure there's more than enough in the crate. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Any luck with the obsidian? Look to the northeast and I'm sure you'll find it. Yes, yes. Absolutely positive.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Any luck finding the flatweed? Look to the northeast and I'm sure you'll find it. Yes, yes. Absolutely positive.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Any luck finding an appleseed? Look in the waters of the upper Yat Khaal and I'm sure you'll find one. Yes, yes. Absolutely positive.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: No need to show that to me. Our instructor is right over there.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: If you have business, I'm afraid it must wait.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: If you have business, I'm afraid it must wait.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: This is from the Namazu, you say?

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: I am honored to know they believe my teachings merit such a reward.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: Ah, obsidian! This will serve us well in fashioning arrows and spears.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: Ah, flatweed! Even in small quantities it is a very potent medicinal herb. I shall use it wisely.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: Ah, an appleseed! It has been too long since I've made meals with such a savory ingredient.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: I presume their leader, Seigetsu, is responsible for this gift? Pray, give him and all the Namazu of Dhoro Iloh my thanks.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: To be honest, I was unsure what to make of their request at first. Even now I wonder how they might attempt to imitate the art of Azim Bökh. But they listen to my words earnestly and their intentions seem genuine. Perhaps someday their efforts will bear fruit.

dialogue.name: ORONIRWOMAN03128
dialogue.text: Pray, give my regards to the Namazu of Dhoro Iloh. I look forward to teaching more of them of Azim Bökh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03128
dialogue.text: Our instructor seemed quite pleased with the gift. Yes, yes. Her expression was very cheerful.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: So, how did the Oronir receive our gift?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Wonderful. Then it is safe to say our lessons can continue.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Perhaps someday, with enough training, we can even compete against them in the Azim Bökh!

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Imagine if we won. We could become leaders of the Oronir clan. N-Not that we would intentionally usurp power from their leader. That would be absurd... <ahem>
